Since nobody seems interested in the objective questions, I'll switch 
to some subjective questions:

1)Name the hardest scenario and justify your answer.

2)Name the scenario that has the best NPCs and justify your answer.

3)Name the scenario that has the most usefull NPCs and justify your 
answer.

These questions are upon for discussion.
